key_points: A couple traveling through Wyoming's Grand Teton National Park captured a video featuring what may be Gabby Petito's van.
The video, posted by Jenn and Kyle Bethune, was taken on August 27.
Citizen sleuths noted similarities between items seen near the van and Gabby Petito's belongings.
The video contributed to the discovery of remains believed to be those of Gabby Petito.
Another tourist, Miranda Baker, claimed she picked up Brian Laundrie hitchhiking in the area.
Laundrie allegedly offered Baker $200 for a ride and mentioned camping without Petito.
Petito was reported missing by her family on September 11.
Brian Laundrie returned to Florida without Petito and is considered a person of interest.
Authorities found human remains consistent with Petito's description in the area shown in the Bethunes' video.
A search for Laundrie is underway after his parents reported him missing.
spokespersons: Adam Scott Wadnt (Assistant Professor, John Jay College of Criminal Justice)
